Well I would say the issue with this stock is the debt. According to Yahoo data, over the trailing twelve months, KRA spent $76 million on interest, which comes out to about 4% of revenues (76/1700). 4% of revenues is a pretty heavy interest burden, especially when Wall Street values the business at .3x sales (Yahoo, 2/3/20). Also, according to Yahoo data, only a touch of long term debt was paid down over the last year, with the number steady at roughly $1.4 billion, a number which is about 2.5 times the current market cap of $531 million as of 2/3/20.
